member.name: M:Spring2.Core.HTTP.ResourceUtility.GetResourceStream(System.Web.HttpContext,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the resource stream. Assumes that this resource is a text based resource file.

member.name: M:Spring2.Core.HTTP.ResourceUtility.GetResourceStream(System.Web.HttpContext,System.String,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Gets the resource stream. If desiredFormat is null, it is assumed that the resouce is text. Otherwise, it is an image.
